1965-06-01|1966-12-30.description:
1. Cover by Wayne Boring and Kurt Schaffenberger.
  2. "The Catwoman's Black Magic!" (part 1) "Catwoman Gets the Bird!" (part 2) "Superman's Cat-astrophe!" (part 3) written by Leo Dorfman, penciled and inked by Kurt Schaffenberger.
  3. "Cap's Hobby Hints How to do it Better" by Henry Boltinoff.
  4. "Lost - - A Free Education!" public service message from Binky.

Notes:

  • First Silver-Age appearance of the Catwoman.
  • Story continues in the next issue.

"It's a CATastrophe for Superman when he's bewitched by Batman's feline foe in 'The Catwoman's Black Magic!'"

Catwoman: Turning Superman into a cat was my most purr-fect crime, Lois! And now I'll change you into a mouse!

"Superpussycat formerly Superman : Habitat Kryptonite Cage"

"Special guest villain!... The Penguin

Catwoman kidnaps Lois and makes her dress as Catwoman and try to kill Superman. When Catwoman sees that Superman won't hurt Lois she kidnaps Superman.
1965-06-01|1966-12-30.name: The Catwoman's Black Magic!
